## Sprint 4: V1 Polish & Testing

**Duration**: 1.5 weeks  
**Priority**: High  
**Goal**: Polish all V1 features and ensure production readiness

### Tasks

- [ ] **Performance Optimization**
  - [ ] Add caching layer for API calls
  - [ ] Optimize database queries
  - [ ] Implement request batching
  - [ ] Add loading states
  - [ ] Optimize image loading

- [ ] **Error Handling**
  - [ ] Graceful fallbacks for API failures
  - [ ] User-friendly error messages
  - [ ] Retry logic for failed requests
  - [ ] Offline mode indicators

- [ ] **Mobile Optimization**
  - [ ] Responsive design testing
  - [ ] Touch-friendly interactions
  - [ ] Mobile navigation
  - [ ] Performance on mobile devices

- [ ] **Testing**
  - [ ] Unit tests for critical functions
  - [ ] Integration tests for API endpoints
  - [ ] E2E tests for key user flows
  - [ ] Load testing
  - [ ] Security testing

- [ ] **Documentation**
  - [ ] User guide for staff
  - [ ] Admin documentation
  - [ ] API documentation
  - [ ] Deployment guide

- [ ] **Bug Fixes**
  - [ ] Fix any discovered issues
  - [ ] Address performance bottlenecks
  - [ ] Resolve UI/UX issues

### Acceptance Criteria

- ✅ All V1 features work flawlessly
- ✅ Performance meets targets (< 2s page load)
- ✅ Mobile experience is excellent
- ✅ Error handling is robust
- ✅ Documentation is complete
- ✅ Ready for production deployment

### Dependencies

- Sprints 1-3 complete
- Test data available
- Staging environment set up

### Notes

This sprint ensures V1 is production-ready and provides an excellent user experience.
